name: Wardens Teddy
description:
Its your last night, the prison has been emptied and for the last time you’ll close those doors. But Terence been lost somewhere inside... See if you can find him while avoiding the traps meant for the escapees! 

Run, jump and solve puzzles to rescue your furry friend - maybe while trying to snag a world record or two along the way.


- Battle through 10 unique levels

- Complete for the fastest time with an online leaderboard

- Stop at nothing to find Terence!

---

Btw, I am aware that the leaderboard is kinda messed up, but I'd like to think its Playfab's problem not mine... I have no idea whats going on because the behaviour is inconsistent ): For now, just screenshot your times and send them to your friends for bragging rights :D. I will figure out my error and fix it soon™.

---

To install, just install the installer and click install.
